description:
Mirai`s group and Yoneda secretly prepare for their upcoming showdown.
When the time is ripe, Yoneda makes the first move. He uses the media to tell Mirai`s group the time and location of their final showdown.
Mirai and Saki spend some time alone together so they can brace themselves for what is coming. Finally, the final showdown between the God candidates begins. What is Yoneda planning...?
Source: crunchyroll
